title: Please give me 22 RP
body: I'm in love with the Monarch Kog'Maw skin that is currently on sale and I was wondering if you could give my account the 22 RP that I need to get it! Thanks! :)

replies.body:
Twenty-two RP is a bit of a push; usually people only dear ask for one or two RP.

Anyway, the reds don't read this board. Post this on the [Miscellaneous board](http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/miscellaneous).
